name: Frogo
description:
The first-ever ichigo game! We finally made it.

This game is made for the GameJam SuperSensory MegaMix '21.

In this game you as player control a frog. Control is done via mouse, please read the Controls page in the Menu.

The objective is to jump as high as possible to gain a score and not be claimed by the rising tides.

Multiplayer using Parsec and minigame system coming soon... unfortunately didn't manage in time

Credits:

Poiky - Graphics and sounds

Chichiryuutei - Programming

Music: https://twitter.com/PredatorMsc
